# <code>from yaml</code> for formats

<div class='command-title'>Parse text as .yaml/.yml and create table.</div>

## Signature

```> from yaml```

## Flags

 * ```-h, --help```: Display this help message
## Examples

  Converts yaml formatted string to table
```shell
  > 'a: 1' | from yaml
```
  Converts yaml formatted string to table
```shell
  > '[ a: 1, b: [1, 2] ]' | from yaml
```
